title: Who thinks fiora should get a new skin with her update
body: Her last skin was like 28/8/2012 she could use a new one, maybe to celebrate her update to a skill champ?

replies.body:
Most champs that are on the list for reworks/VUs/etc wont have any new skins worked on until AFTER their rework/etc is completed.

This is why we wont see an Urgot or Taric skin anytime soon.

I'd hazard a guess and say there are Fiora and Sion skins being worked on at the moment, but aren't ready to hit the PBE.
Gangplank got a new skin on his update release, plus a relatively new skin beforehand, so did MF although her update was mostly visual but still.
Yes, but they were also released along side a themed event for those champs.

So? that doesn't change the fact that it is possible to create a skin for a champ on release of their update
there is no barrier stopping it being done

Well there actually is quite the barrier. Mostly in a Visual Update that barrier is the physical model of a champion being changed.
Hence why we wont see a Taric or Urgot skin anytime before their VU, since they are both Sion level of model change.

From what we heard it seems that the VU team is typically separate from the skin team, while at the same time some people interchange between them. So there can easily be collaboration there.
It is possible, but likely too much work at the given point in time, and not to mention that working on a skin side by side with the VU could interfere with the artistic design of what's already given.

But also, why does Fiora need a new skin NOW?
GP and MF makes sense for them to get new skins with this event and their new skins are tied to the lore of the event. Not to mention there are a LOT of skins in the update for the event.
It's likely that there was too much work going on at once for Fiora to get a skin alongside her rework.
But it's also notable that other champions so far haven't really gotten new skins with their reworks.

PS: I really want an Armour of the Fifth Age Sion <3
